thread.title: Glasgow full-back Glenn Bryce out for up to 10 weeks with broken ankle
thread.title_full: Glasgow full-back Glenn Bryce out for up to 10 weeks with broken ankle

title: Glasgow full-back Glenn Bryce out for up to 10 weeks with broken ankle
text:
Glasgow full-back Glenn Bryce out for up to 10 weeks with broken ankle 01 Oct 2015 17:01:55 
comments 
Glasgow full-back Glenn Bryce faces up to 10 weeks out with a broken ankle. 
The 24-year-old - whose brother Kevin is on World Cup duty with Scotland - suffered the injury during Glasgow's friendly against the Army last weekend. 
Warriors say Bryce does not require surgery but will be out of action for around eight to 10 weeks. Related Sport News
